paragraphs.zh-tw: 阿囉哈！(觀眾回應：阿囉哈！)今天我將會讓各位相信現在世界所需要的是...烏克麗麗(夏威夷四弦琴)。你們知道，這是一種很少人會使用的樂器。
paragraphs.en: Aloha. (Audience: Aloha.) Today I'm going to try to convince you that what the world needs now is ukulele. You know, this is the underdog of all instruments.

paragraphs.zh-tw: 而且我始終相信它可以成就和平因為如果每個人都能彈奏烏克麗麗，這個世界必定能成為更令人愉悅的地方。所以我要彈奏的是Queen (皇后合唱團) 的《波希米亞狂想曲》（觀眾笑聲）（音樂）（觀眾掌聲）
paragraphs.en: And I've always believed that it's the instrument of peace, because if everyone played the ukulele, this world would be a much happier place. So I'm going to play Queen's "Bohemian Rhapsody." (Music)
